thumb.title: 【作業用BGM】Weekend Balcony #4 【洋楽】
thumb.description: シリーズ4作目です。。-Song List-1. Gimme Your Heart (Saults)2. Reach This High (Strutman Lane)3. Feels So Right (Blake Aaron)4. La Vida Se Va (Opa!)5. Everymornin' (Coleman Mellett) 6. The Girl Next Door (GIG)7. It Might Have To Be You (Vulfmon & Evangeline) 8. You Are (Egil Eldoen) 9. VITAMIN U (Paul Partohap) 10.Holdin' On (Fonteyn) 11.The Power of Love (Will Downing) 12.Perplexity (Mike Lindup) 13.Always on My Mind (Béranger) 14.There Will Never Be Another You (Ilya Serov)15.Royal Palm Drive (Lance Jyo feat. Jake Shimabukuro) 16.Higher (GAC -Gamaliel Audrey Cantika)
